Several ''Minecraft''-themed '''avatar items''' were available for purchase on the Xbox 360 Marketplace. These included wearable items, such as masks and t-shirts, and props that played short animations and interacted with the player's avatar. 

Additionally, a creeper cap, a ''Minecraft''-styled watch, and a t-shirt with a porkchop design can be obtained as [[Xbox 360 Edition#Awards and unlockables|free awards]] for completing certain in-game tasks. These items were not purchasable on the Marketplace.
